Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Eliminates the power of the governor to issue executive orders for assistance in state disaster emergencies
Summary: Eliminates the powers of the governor to issue any directive necessary to respond to a state disaster.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to eliminating the powers of the governor to issue any directive necessary to respond to a state disaster
